channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Who am I? A South Korean adoptee finds answers about the past â€” just not the ones she wants
item.description: Rebecca Kimmel sat in a small room, staring at the baby photo she had just unearthed from her adoption file. This baby was not her. So who was she?

item.title: Trial begins for Georgia woman accused of killing her toddler
item.description: Testimony is underway in the trial of a Georgia woman accused of killing her 20-month-old son and dumping his body in a trash bin two years ago.

item.title: Arkansas Supreme Court rejects challenge to ballot measure that would revoke casino license
item.description: The Arkansas Supreme Court has rejected part of a lawsuit challenging a ballot measure that would revoke the license for a planned casino.
